::Shadow Wing::

She felt someone grab her leg, and the pain shot through her like a 
bolt of lightening.  She screamed in her mind.  She couldn't move.  
She couldn't open her eyes to see who was dragging her.  She saw only 
the blackness surround her. 


-----Original Message-----
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Killer/Striker/Ramulus/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::
> 
> Prowl's eyes widen as he recieves Dinobot's transmission. His wings 
twitch, 
> causing his to miss his dive at Sixshot.
> 
> "The Alliance captured them?! We-AAAAH!!!"
> 
> Jetpack on full power, Killer smashes into Prowl, the predacon's 
sword going 
> into Prowl's side. Prowl kicks Killer slightly away, then fires a 
few acid 
> pellets at him.
> 
> "We have a battle here at the Ark, Dinobot," he yells quickly into 
his 
> comm-link, "Get back here. We'll need to get equipment to get Iron 
Raptor and 
> Tav back."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker slashes again at Hades. He growls. The newcomers were 
ignoring quite 
> alot of damage (Hint, hint, Inferno).
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus continues to fire at Sixshot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing Shadow Wing fall, Smokescreen runs over to her, grabbing her 
by the 
> leg and begining to drag her toward the Ark.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramhorn takes out another charge, throwing it at Shuko.
